A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Unnecessary long movie with again unconvincing villains (e.g. Kylo Res\, Supreme Leader Snoke) that fails completely to make a credible story taking place in the Star Wars universe. Heroine Rey part did not meet the expectations of the audience. A totally contrary to mythos Luke Skywalker saves the movie but destroying all beliefs on the Jedi code. This is despite the wonderful acting of Mark Hamill and Ms Ridley. Again there is no direction or focus in these new trilogy that relies solely on fantastic special eft and action scenes. Jedi battles cannot compare to the prequel trilogy which actually enriched the franchise with the fantasy and mysticism of Star Wars.
